unnormalised: ## Rental Yields: Are you REALLY making money on your investment? #RealEstate #Property
normalised: ## rental yields: are you really making money on your investment? hash real estate hash property

unnormalised: Okay folks, let's talk rental yields. I see so many folks in Mumbai buying apartments, thinking they're instant millionaires. But are you *really* making money?
normalised: okay folks, let us talk rental yields. i see so many folks in mumbai buying apartments, thinking they are instant millionaires. but are you really making money?

unnormalised: Rental yield, simply put, is the return you get on your investment from rent. It's calculated as (Annual Rental Income / Property Value) * 100.
normalised: rental yield, simply put, is the return you get on your investment from rent. it is calculated as open parenthesis annual rental income divided by property value close parenthesis asterisk one hundred.

unnormalised: So, if you bought a flat in Bandra for Rs. 2 Crores and rent it out for Rs. 50,000 per month, your annual rent is Rs. 6,00,000. That gives you a yield of just 3%!
normalised: so, if you bought a flat in bandra for rupee two crore and rent it out for rupee fifty thousand per month, your annual rent is rupee six lakh. that gives you a yield of just three percent!

unnormalised: 3%?! Are you kidding me? My FD at SBI is giving me more peace of mind!
normalised: three percent?! are you kidding me? my F D at S B I is giving me more peace of mind!

unnormalised: And don't forget to factor in expenses, ya! Maintenance, property tax, maybe even a *chai-pani* charge for the society uncle who "helps" you find tenants. These eat into your profit big time.
normalised: and do not forget to factor in expenses, ya! maintenance, property tax, maybe even a chai-pani charge for the society uncle who "helps" you find tenants. these eat into your profit big time.

unnormalised: Now, some people swear by rental yields, especially around festival time like Onam when everyone's looking for short-term rentals near their family homes in Kerala. But honestly, chasing yields can be a gamble. You might find a good yield in a smaller town, like Nagpur maybe, but the property value appreciation might be slower than in a metro like Bangalore.
normalised: now, some people swear by rental yields, especially around festival time like onam when everyone is looking for short-term rentals near their family homes in kerala. but honestly, chasing yields can be a gamble. you might find a good yield in a smaller town, like nagpur maybe, but the property value appreciation might be slower than in a metro like bangalore.

unnormalised: Think of it like this: buying property is like cooking a biryani. You need the right ingredients (location, price, potential rent) and the right cooking process (due diligence, smart management) to get a tasty result.
normalised: think of it like this: buying property is like cooking a biryani. you need the right ingredients open parenthesis location, price, potential rent close parenthesis and the right cooking process open parenthesis due diligence, smart management close parenthesis to get a tasty result.

unnormalised: Do your homework, folks! Don't just jump in because your cousin bought a villa near Hosur Road. Rental yield is just one piece of the puzzle!
normalised: do your homework, folks! do not just jump in because your cousin bought a villa near hosur road. rental yield is just one piece of the puzzle!
